intro: Search the dark. Sell what you find. Survive what finds you.
description:
Step into the haunted remnants of forgotten facilities, where danger lurks in every shadow and profit hides in plain sight. In R.E.P.O Horror, your task is clear: locate valuable objects hidden throughout eerie, monster-infested locations and sell them to survive and advance.

But nothing is ever truly safe.
With every passing moment, the threat grows. The longer you stay, the more intense the horror becomes.

Key Features:
	•	Tense Exploration – Navigate pitch-black environments using only your flashlight. Every sound, every shadow could hide something valuable—or something deadly.
	•	Scavenge and Profit – Collect items of varying value and condition. Handle them carefully to avoid damage and maximize earnings.
	•	Escalating Danger – Hostile entities appear the longer you remain on the map. Time is against you—move quickly or face the consequences.
	•	Energy and Survival – Sprinting drains your energy. Rest is possible, but risky. Strategic stamina management is essential.
	•	High-Stakes Decisions – Risk staying longer for greater rewards, or escape early with what you’ve got? Every choice matters.
	•	Unlockable Skins – Spend your hard-earned cash to unlock new character appearances and show off your survival style.

Can you make it out with your findings? Or will the darkness claim you first?
